scripts.test: echo "Use: npm run cy:run ou npm run cy:open"
scripts.report:open: sh -c 'R=cypress/reports/html/index.html; (command -v xdg-open >/dev/null && xdg-open "$R") || (command -v sensible-browser >/dev/null && sensible-browser "$R") || (command -v google-chrome >/dev/null && google-chrome "$R") || (command -v chromium >/dev/null && chromium "$R") || (command -v firefox >/dev/null && firefox "$R") || echo "Abra $R"'
